description:
A dynamic and accelerated digital journey and revolutionary roadmaps.

Awaze UK, the name behind the UK’s leading holiday rental brands shares their experiences, challenges, and learnings around their digital ambitions, and how the latest technology levers have been pulled to ensure their destination is reached.

Come hear the story of how digital is transforming experiences for both holidaymakers and owners of holiday homes or resorts.

SPEAKERS
Lucy Auckland - Core Product Director, Awaze
Andy MacGilvery - Director of Engineering, Awaze

***
This event is part of the Leeds Digital Festival 2021. (September 20-October 1).
See the full programme of events at https://leedsdigitalfestival.org/

***
The talk will be recorded and a link to the recording added in the Comments here shortly after the event
***
title: The Awaze Digital Journey - Learning, Commerce, Automation!
